Name: Jab
Description: Basic jab with your lead hand. Recover 1 Focus on landed.

Name: Lead Hook
Description: Quick hook with lead hand. Recover 2 Stamina on landed.

Name: Rear Hook
Description: Powerful Rear hand Hook. Deal additional 1 damage on clean hit.

Name: Lead Uppercut
Description: Lead uppercut that caught opponent off-guard

Name: Rear Uppercut
Description: Devastating rear uppercut at close range. Deal additional 1 damage on landed.

Name: Stiff Jab
Description: Jab with you body weight behind it. Recover 1 Focus on landed.

Name: Flicker Jab
Description: Quick jab that flick forward in weird angle. Recover 1 Focus on landed.

Name: Step back Jab
Description: Step back while throwing a jab. Recover 1 Focus on landed

Name: Step in Jab
Description: Step in while throwing a jab. Recover 1 Focus on landed

Name: Sharp Jab
Description: Sharp jab that snap out and retract quickly. Recover 2 Focus on landed.
